reservation.title: Reservation
reservation.contactUsByPhone: Contact Us by Phone/Wechat/ Kakao Talk / WhatsApp
reservation.spaAddress: SEN SPA Da Nang: 21 Thai Phien Street, Phuoc Ninh Ward, Hai Chau District, Da Nang
reservation.welcomeMessage: We are happy to welcome you to SEN SPA Da Nang! You can make a reservation at our spa by one of the following ways:

waysToBook.sendMessage: Sending us message on Whatsapp, Kakao, Wechat, Zalo
waysToBook.bookOnline: Book online on our website and receive instant confirmation

reservation.maxGuests: You can book for a maximum of 10 guests at one time on our online booking platform. Simply choose:
reservation.confirmationMessage: Our staff will send you a confirmation email or message as soon as we receive your booking.

bookingSteps.location: Spa location you want to book

aboutReservation.title: About reservation
aboutReservation.description: If you have any pre-existing health conditions such as lower back pain, skin conditions, injuries, pregnancy, etc., please inform us in advance so we can tailor the best service for you.

aboutChange.title: About change / cancellation of reservation
aboutChange.description: Please make changes or cancel at least 24 hours prior to the appointment. This allows us to have enough time to properly receive other guests' booking.

aboutPayment.title: About payment
aboutPayment.description: Payment can be made in cash or with credit cards. Payment is made after the treatment. Tips are not required but always welcomed.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.welcomeMessage: Let us pamper you with our unique treatments. We look forward to seeing you at SEN SPA Da Nang.
contact.scanQRCode: Scan this code to start a WhatsApp or Kakao Talk chat with us

messages.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

about.title: About Us
about.welcomeTitle: Welcome to SEN SPA Da Nang
about.paragraph1: With more than 10 years of experience in tourism and 6 years working directly in the spa field, the founder of SEN SPA Da Nang has had the chance to listen, understand, and truly connect with what people need after long journeys: a place to rest, recharge, and find balance.
about.paragraph2: Out of a deep love for Da Nang, a peaceful and welcoming seaside city, and the desire to create a refined wellness destination here, SEN SPA Da Nang was founded in 2023.
about.paragraph3: SEN SPA is more than just a spa. It is an experience where you are cared for by professional therapists, where you can slow down, breathe, and enjoy a calm space that helps restore both body and soul.
about.paragraph4: We believe every moment of relaxation at Sen Spa is part of a beautiful story we want to share with you: a story of peace, of small but complete joys, right in the middle of modern life.
about.address: 21 Thai Phien Street, Phuoc Ninh Ward, Hai Chau District, Da Nang

home.heroBanner: A RELAXING ESCAPE FOR ALL YOUR SENSES
home.subtitle: A relaxing escape for all your senses, in the heart of Da Nang.

about.founded: Founded in 2023 with the aim to provide a relaxing spa experience for both travelers and local residents.
about.location: Located in the heart of the city, we take pride in our team of professional, highly skilled therapists.
about.services: SEN SPA Da Nang offers a wide range of foot and body therapies, facial care, as well as spa packages.

featuredProducts.title: FEATURED PRODUCTS
featuredProducts.description: Discover our exclusive spa packages and special offers

testimonials.title: What Guests are saying...
testimonials.description: We hope you enjoy reading our guests reviews as much as ours.

happyGuests.title: Our Happy Guests
happyGuests.description: We cherish each and every moment of welcoming you to our spa. Spread the joy!

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose SEN SPA Da Nang?
whyChooseUs.description: Visit SEN SPA Da Nang and take a heavenly break from your daily routine

couples.title: Perfect for couples, groups, and solo travelers
couples.description: Whether you're traveling alone, or on a honeymoon, or even with young kids, we always have something to offer.

location.title: Convenient and central location
location.description: All our spas are just a short walk from iconic landmarks of Da Nang such as Dragon Bridge, Han River, and Con Market.

therapists.title: Skilled therapists and attentive receptionists
therapists.description: Be warmly welcomed and expertly cared for by friendly staff from start to finish.

menu.title: Spa Menu & Prices
menu.note: You can choose multiple treatments in one visit. For groups of 3 or more people, please
menu.noteEnd: We look forward to serving you!
menu.description: Discover our relaxing spa treatments and wellness
menu.descriptionEnd: Call hotline +84 976 591 515 for consultation and appointment booking.

error.erSocial: Social ID must be at least 3 characters

placeholder.title: Feel free to let us know if you need assistance or have an additional request so we can help to accommodate you or personalize your spa experience.

policy.title: Cancellation Policy
policy.line1: Please cancel or reschedule at least 24 hours in advance of your reservation time.
policy.line2: Upon booking, we will send you a confirmation email to confirm whether we can arrange the service for you and in case fully booked, we will inform you the closest time available.
policy.line3: If you need to make changes or make an urgent booking, please contact our hotline: +84 976 591 515 or email senspa.dn@gmail.com.
policy.line4: We suggest you arrive at our spa 10 minutes earlier to relax before the treatment time.
